name: Crash Simulator 18
description:
DESCRIPTION

Crash Simulator 18 is simulator game where the point is to crash your favorite car into peaces. The game has "Crash Ring" level full of dangerous objects where you can test the durability of your car. Smash into dangerous walls, fall from the top of the tower or get shot from the canon. CS18 also features 18 levels where the aim is to reach the finish line for certain time with minimal damage. Reach the finish line as fast as you can to appear on world leaderboard and compete with other people. Make your car unique with skins and colors which are going to be unlocked to you at certain levels. 

Crash Simulator 18 Features:
-Realistic damaging physics 
-18 hard campaign levels
-3 cars
-Full car body color customization 
-Smooth car handling
-In game World leaderboard
-Crash level mode
-Detailed car interior and exterior
